name: INVOICE
description: This table includes the basic data for the invoice (INV) record. It contains one row for each used INV record (excluding unused pre-allocated invoices). Note that a row in this table can correspond to multiple claims sent.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The Invoice ID.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID associated with this invoice.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The account ID that is associated with this invoice.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service area associated with this invoice.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The ID of the revenue location associated with this invoice.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The ID of the place of service associated with this invoice.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the department associated with this invoice.

columns.name: UB_COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The number of covered days for a uniform billing claim.

columns.name: UB_NON_COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The number of non-covered days for a uniform billing claim.

columns.name: UB_COINSURANCE_DAYS
columns.description: The number of coinsurance days for the uniform billing claim.

columns.name: UB_PRINCIPA_DIAG_ID
columns.description: The principal diagnosis for the uniform billing claim.

columns.name: UB_TYPE_OF_BILL_STR
columns.description: Stores the type of bill that was sent out on the claim.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the billing provider associated with the invoice.

columns.name: ACCT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: Stores the account serial number associated with the invoice.

columns.name: PAT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: Stores the patient serial number associated with the invoice.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: Stores the requisition grouper ID associated with the invoice when there is no patient record.

columns.name: TAX_ID
columns.description: Stores the tax ID associated with the invoice.

columns.name: TAX_ID_TYPE
columns.description: Stores the type of tax ID associated with the invoice.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Stores the treatment plan ID associated with the invoice.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the insurance amount for the invoice.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_AMT
columns.description: Stores the initial self-pay amount for the invoice.

columns.name: INIT_INSURANCE_BAL
columns.description: Stores the initial insurance amount for the invoice.

columns.name: INIT_SELF_PAY_BAL
columns.description: Stores the initial self-pay amount for the invoice.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID
columns.description: Stores the bill area associated with the invoice.

columns.name: BILL_AREA_ID_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.

columns.name: PB_HOSP_ACT_ID
columns.description: The Professional Billing Hospital Account ID.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column shows the status of the invoice record.
